Header: Central Troops Join Studentsâ€™ Blood Donation Programme
Content: Troops of the Security Force Headquarters - Central (SFHQ-Cen) on Tuesday (1) for the benefit of patients in Diyatalawa area donated their blood during a blood collection arrangement, organized and held at Diyatalawa Maha Vidyalaya premises by teachers and students. A group of 31 Army troops gave blood during this campaign where school teachers and students joined together. The Civil Coordination Officer and the troops under the guidance of Major General Laksiri Waduge, Commander, Security Forces - Central took part in the programme. Diyatalawa Maha Vidyalaya had turned to the SFHQ-Cen for assistance in this regard.
